nodes.id: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Information Support Force

location.zh-cn: 北京市朝阳区安贞街道黄寺大街9号
location.en: No. 9 Huangsi Street, Anzhen Sub-district, Chaoyang District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一个独立兵种，由中央军事委员会直接领导，为副战区级单位。
description.en: An independent service arm of the People's Liberation Army, directly led by the Central Military Commission, with a deputy theater command level.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家军事机关，领导全国武装力量。
description.en: The highest national military organ of the People's Republic of China, leading the nation's armed forces.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要国家武装力量。
description.en: The principal military force of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，现任中国人民解放军信息支援部队司令员。
description.en: A lieutenant general in the PLA Ground Force, currently serving as the Commander of the PLA Information Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，现任中国人民解放军信息支援部队政治委员。
description.en: A general in the PLA Ground Force, currently serving as the Political Commissar of the PLA Information Support Force.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中国人民解放军信息支援部队委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中国人民解放军信息支援部队委员会
en: Committee of the Communist Party of China in the People's Liberation Army Information Support Force

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在中国人民解放军信息支援部队内的组织。
description.en: The organization of the Communist Party of China within the PLA Information Support Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾存在的军种，现已撤销番号，其力量被重组为信息支援部队、军事航天部队和网络空间部队等。
description.en: A former service of the People's Liberation Army, which has been disbanded. Its components were reorganized into the Information Support Force, Aerospace Force, and Cyberspace Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事航天部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事航天部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的独立兵种，由原战略支援部队的航天系统部改设而成。
description.en: An independent service arm of the People's Liberation Army, formed from the former Aerospace Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军网络空间部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军网络空间部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的独立兵种，由原战略支援部队的网络系统部改设而成。
description.en: An independent service arm of the People's Liberation Army, formed from the former Cyberspace Systems Department of the Strategic Support Force.

nodes.id: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利80周年大会

zh-cn: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利80周年大会

description.zh-cn: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利80周年的大会，解放军信息支援部队在此次活动上首次公开亮相。
description.en: A conference commemorating the 80th anniversary of the victory of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression and the World Anti-Fascist War, where the PLA Information Support Force made its first public appearance.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部
中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗、雷达部
en: Electronic Countermeasure Department of the PLA General Staff Department

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军总参谋部下属的部门，负责电子对抗与雷达事务，是战略支援部队的前身之一。
description.en: A former department under the PLA General Staff Department responsible for electronic countermeasures and radar affairs, one of the predecessors of the Strategic Support Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾主持总参谋部工作，并推动了总参四部的组建。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who once presided over the work of the General Staff Department and promoted the establishment of its Fourth Department.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动，期间总参雷达部的筹组工作被迫中断。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, during which the preparatory work for the General Staff's Radar Department was forced to halt.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾向中央和毛泽东呈交报告建议加强电子对抗工作，并成立总参四部。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who submitted a report to the Central Committee and Mao Zedong, proposing to strengthen electronic warfare capabilities and establish the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，收到了叶剑英关于成立总参四部的报告。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who received Ye Jianying's report on establishing the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，被任命为总参四部首任部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, appointed as the first head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参四部副部长及部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as deputy head and later head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参四部副部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as deputy head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参四部副部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as deputy head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参四部副部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as deputy head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参四部政委。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as the Political Commissar of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参电子对抗雷达部部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as the head of the General Staff's Electronic Countermeasure and Radar Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军将领，曾任总参电子对抗雷达部副部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army who served as the deputy head of the General Staff's Electronic Countermeasure and Radar Department.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军电子工程学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军电子工程学院

description.zh-cn: 曾隶属于总参四部的军事院校。
description.en: A military academy formerly subordinate to the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的组织级别之一。
description.en: An organizational grade level within the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队工程大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队工程大学
en: PLA Information Support Force Engineering University

description.zh-cn: 隶属于中国人民解放军信息支援部队的工程大学。
description.en: An engineering university subordinate to the PLA Information Support Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队由中央军事委员会直接领导。
description.en: The PLA Information Support Force is directly led by the Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队是中国人民解放军的一个独立兵种。
description.en: The PLA Information Support Force is an independent service arm of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队
relationships.target: 副战区级

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队是副战区级单位。
description.en: The PLA Information Support Force is a deputy theater command level unit.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队

description.zh-cn: 毕毅于2024年4月起担任中国人民解放军信息支援部队司令员。
description.en: Bi Yi has served as the Commander of the PLA Information Support Force since April 2024.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队

description.zh-cn: 李伟于2024年4月起担任中国人民解放军信息支援部队政治委员。
description.en: Li Wei has served as the Political Commissar of the PLA Information Support Force since April 2024.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中国人民解放军信息支援部队委员会
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中国人民解放军信息支援部队委员会是信息支援部队内的中共组织。
description.en: The Committee of the Communist Party of China in the People's Liberation Army Information Support Force is the CCP organization within the Information Support Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月19日，中央军委决定成立中国人民解放军信息支援部队。
description.en: On April 19, 2024, the Central Military Commission decided to establish the PLA Information Support Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

description.zh-cn: 2024年4月19日，中央军委决定撤销中国人民解放军战略支援部队番号。
description.en: On April 19, 2024, the Central Military Commission decided to disband the PLA Strategic Support Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队

description.zh-cn: 信息支援部队是以原战略支援部队机关及其信息通信保障力量为基础创设的。
description.en: The Information Support Force was created based on the former headquarters and information and communication support elements of the Strategic Support Force.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队
relationships.target: 纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利80周年大会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队将在纪念中国人民抗日战争暨世界反法西斯战争胜利80周年大会上首次公开亮相。
description.en: The PLA Information Support Force will make its first public appearance at the commemoration of the 80th anniversary of the victory of the Chinese People's War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression and the World Anti-Fascist War.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1965年12月，杨成武主持总参谋部工作后，指示研究筹组雷达部，并于1974年回到总参后再次推动加强电子对抗力量建设。
description.en: In December 1965, after taking charge of the General Staff Department, Yang Chengwu instructed to study the formation of a radar department, and after returning to the General Staff in 1974, he again promoted the strengthening of electronic warfare capabilities.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 由于受到文化大革命的干扰，总参雷达部的筹组工作被迫中断。
description.en: Due to the interference of the Cultural Revolution, the preparatory work for the General Staff's Radar Department was forced to be suspended.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1975年12月18日，叶剑英向中央和毛泽东呈交报告，建议成立总参四部（即后来的电子对抗、雷达部）。
description.en: On December 18, 1975, Ye Jianying submitted a report to the Central Committee and Mao Zedong, proposing the establishment of the Fourth Department of the General Staff (later the Electronic Countermeasure and Radar Department).

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东收到了叶剑英关于成立总参四部的报告，该报告建议加强电子对抗工作。
description.en: Mao Zedong received Ye Jianying's report on the establishment of the Fourth Department of the General Staff, which proposed strengthening electronic warfare work.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1977年4月，王诤被任命兼任总参四部部长，直至1978年病逝。
description.en: In April 1977, Wang Zheng was concurrently appointed as the Head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff, a position he held until his death in 1978.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1976年6月，屈培壅被任命为总参四部副部长。
description.en: In June 1976, Qu Peiyong was appointed Deputy Head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1980年1月，屈培壅被任命为总参四部部长。
description.en: In January 1980, Qu Peiyong was appointed Head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1976年6月，孙玉衡被任命为总参四部副部长。
description.en: In June 1976, Sun Yuheng was appointed Deputy Head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1976年6月，李文昌被任命为总参四部副部长。
description.en: In June 1976, Li Wenchang was appointed Deputy Head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1976年6月，申仲义被任命为总参四部副部长。
description.en: In June 1976, Shen Zhongyi was appointed Deputy Head of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1978年10月，李光被任命为总参四部政委。
description.en: In October 1978, Li Guang was appointed Political Commissar of the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1985年8月，靳庆丰被任命为总参电子对抗雷达部部长。
description.en: In August 1985, Jin Qingfeng was appointed Head of the General Staff's Electronic Countermeasure and Radar Department.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 1985年8月，张有才被任命为总参电子对抗雷达部副部长。
description.en: In August 1985, Zhang Youcai was appointed Deputy Head of the General Staff's Electronic Countermeasure and Radar Department.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军电子工程学院
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军电子工程学院曾是总参四部下属单位。
description.en: The PLA Electronic Engineering College was once a unit subordinate to the Fourth Department of the General Staff.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军总参谋部电子对抗部
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

description.zh-cn: 总参四部是2016年军队改革中成立的战略支援部队的前身组成部分之一。
description.en: The Fourth Department of the General Staff was one of the predecessor components of the Strategic Support Force established during the 2016 military reform.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队工程大学
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队工程大学是隶属于信息支援部队的院校。
description.en: The PLA Information Support Force Engineering University is an academy subordinate to the Information Support Force.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军信息支援部队工程大学

description.zh-cn: 2025年5月，中央军委决定组建中国人民解放军信息支援部队工程大学。
description.en: In May 2025, the Central Military Commission decided to establish the PLA Information Support Force Engineering University.
